html:
PC Number Date Chapter Chapter Year Bill Dept
 2025-02842025-03-05FIN
ActFinancial Administration Act
SubjectAggregate borrowing limit for the 2025-26 fiscal year
PrecisOrder amending Order in Council P.C. 2024-0266 of March 25, 2024 to 1) specify $733 billion to be the maximum aggregate principal amount of money which may be borrowed by the Minister of Finance in the 2025-2026 fiscal year to permit operations related to the management of the public debt; and 2) designate which officials from Finance Canada and the Bank of Canada are authorized to sign and countersign securities of Canada.
AttachmentsAttachment
precis: Order amending Order in Council P.C. 2024-0266 of March 25, 2024 to 1) specify $733 billion to be the maximum aggregate principal amount of money which may be borrowed by the Minister of Finance in the 2025-2026 fiscal year to permit operations related to the management of the public debt; and 2) designate which officials from Finance Canada and the Bank of Canada are authorized to sign and countersign securities of Canada.
